placeholder.blindLevelMin: minimum position if sun calculated position
placeholder.blindLevelMax: maximum position if sun calculated position
placeholder.sunControlMode: select if sun control is active and how it should working
placeholder.overwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain
placeholder.sunFloorLength: (opt) the extent to which direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor
placeholder.sunMinAltitude: (opt) minimum altitude of the sun for determination of blind position
placeholder.sunMinDelta: (opt) define the minimum change of the blind position
placeholder.oversteerBlindPos: blind position when the compare be the case
placeholder.smoothTime: (opt) prevents changes due to sun in the given time
placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.btnSort: sort all rules, Attention this can change the behavior!
placeholder.ruleTimeDays: select days wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.autoTrigger: automatic triggers new calculation of the blind position in a dynamic changing time interval

text.time:
Time control:Only rows will be evaluated, where property is not used or matches the selected value.
until:The first matching line will used, where defined time is not used or greater than now.
from:The last matching line will used, where defined time is not used or less than now.
text.blindLevelDefault: if no rule matches the following position will be used, On sun light restriction this is the blind level wenn sun is not in the window.
text.overwrite: manual overwrite of the blind position
text.sunControlMode: Instead of the default blind position there can be restricted the extent to which direct sunlight may shine into the room.
text.windowAzimuth: representing the orientation of the window to geographical north (in degrees) when the sun falls into the window (sun azimuth).
text.windowPos: window settings, measurement from the floor to bottom and top of the window covered by the blind
text.oversteer: allows to oversteer the position depending on the sun under defined condition such as weather (for example sky covered by clouds, lighting, ...)
text.sunControlMaximization:
• If no rule or override matches
    • If the sun is not in the window the blind will set to defined min position. (oversteer will be ignored)
    • If the sun is in the window
    • If any oversteer data are setup and oversteer conditions are fulfilled the blind will set to the defined oversteer blind position.
    • otherwise the blind level is set to defined max position.
text.sunControlRestriction: If no rule or override matches, the node calculates the appropriate blind position to restrict the amount of direct sunlight entering the room.
text.sunCtrlLoF: The limit to what extent direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor.
text.sunCtrlRestrict: Limit the frequency of changes by time and/or delta; set the minimum altitude (in degree) of the sun

reasons.overwriteExpire: position is overwritten with priority __prio__, will expire __dateISO__
reasons.default: position is set to default position because no other rule matches
reasons.ruleTimeCond: position by time rule __timeOp__ __timeLocal__ and condition __text__ [__number__] __name__
reasons.sunMinDelta: change is less ad min delta
reasons.smooth: Position is not changed to __pos__ because not enough time has passed since the last change (time smooth)
reasons.sunNotInWinMin: Sun not in window (Level is minimum)

errors.invalid-blind-level: Given Blind-Position __pos__ is not a valid Position!
errors.getPropertyData: error getting condition data: "__message__" skipping time
errors.smoothTimeToolong: The selected smooth is too long!!
errors.usingTempValue: Could not evaluate __type__.__value__ and using stored value "__usedValue__"!
